title: Terms of Service
subtitle: Last updated: January 23, 2026
s1_intro: By accessing and using ABD RAG Platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
s1_warning: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use the Service.
s2_intro: ABD RAG Platform is an agentic AI infrastructure designed for high-precision analysis of elevator orders and technical compliance. The Service includes:
s3_f1_body: Attempting to decipher, decompile, or extract the source code.
s3_f2_body: Commercializing access to the Service without written authorization.
s3_f3_body: Performing massive scraping or DDoS attacks.
s3_f4_body: Uploading documents that infringe on copyrights.
s3_warning: Violation of these prohibitions will result in immediate account suspension without refund.
s4_c1_desc: You retain all rights to the documents you upload. ABD RAG Platform does not claim ownership over your content.
s4_c2_desc: The Service is the exclusive property of ABD Technologies S.L. and is protected by international intellectual property laws.
s5_c1_desc: Monthly or annual charges. Prices may change with 30 days' notice.
s5_c2_desc: Cancel anytime. Access continues until the end of the paid period.
s6_p1: ABD RAG Platform is provided "as is". Our monthly Uptime commitment is 99.9%.
s6_quote: "Our maximum liability for any claim is limited to the amount paid for the Service in the last 12 months."
contact_desc: Our legal team is available for clarifications.
